rules.description: Terms of use of the PayOnTon trading platform

points.title: Honesty and respect for other users
points.description: Be polite and respectful when communicating with other users. Offensive language, threats, aggressive or disrespectful behavior is prohibited.

points.title: Prohibition of fraudulent manipulations
points.description: Any form of fraud (including deception, withholding information, misleading other users) is strictly prohibited. Creating multiple accounts to gain benefits, artificially boosting ratings, or reviews is forbidden.

points.title: Prohibition of review manipulation
points.description: The platform strictly monitors the authenticity of reviews and ratings. Prohibited:
list: Collusion for artificially increasing or decreasing ratings.
Use of fake accounts or external services for review manipulation.
points.subDesc: Any attempt to manipulate reviews will lead to account blocking.

points.title: Authenticity of goods and services
points.description: Sellers must provide complete and accurate information about the goods and services they offer. It is prohibited to list non-existent, stolen, or inactive items. If you are selling in-game items, they must be obtained fairly and not violate game rules.

points.title: Secure transactions
points.description: All transactions should be conducted within the platform. This protects you from fraud. Avoid external platforms or payment methods not supported by our service.

points.title: No spam and advertising
points.description: Advertising of goods and services outside this platform, spam, or mass messaging to attract buyers is prohibited.

points.title: Responsibility for your actions
points.description: Each user is responsible for their actions on the platform. In case of rule violations, the administration reserves the right to impose temporary or permanent account blocking.

points.title: Feedback
points.description: If you encounter rule violations or suspected fraud, please report it to the administration. We will carefully review each case and take necessary actions.

miniDesc.text: We strive to maintain a high level of safety and honesty. Any violation, especially related to fraud, review manipulation, or other dishonest activities, may result in a permanent ban from the platform without the possibility of reinstatement.
